name: PBF Energy Inc.
summary: PBF Energy Inc. is a leading independent petroleum refining and logistics company in the United States, operating six major refineries and associated infrastructure. The company produces and supplies transportation fuels, heating oil, lubricants, petrochemical feedstocks, and other petroleum products, serving key regions across the U.S. PBF Energy is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker PBF and is headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey.
